dcterms:description: A video dataset that contains a fully-observed user-item interaction matrix used for evaluation. Within this matrix, each userâ€™s feedback towards any item is known. The normalized viewing time of a video is used as a reward signal.
dcterms:title: KuaiRec

dcterms:creator: Chongming Gao
Shijun Li
Yuan Zhang
Jiawei Chen
Biao Li
Wenqiang Lei
Peng Jiang
Xiangnan He
dcterms:description: A video dataset that contains user-item interaction collected by randomly inserting the target videos in the standard recommendation stream. This part is used to simulate a fully observed interaction matrix like KuaiRec for evaluation, while the data collected in the standard stream serves as the training set.
dcterms:title: KuaiRand-Pure

dcterms:creator: Tobias Schnabel
Adith Swaminathan
Ashudeep Singh
Navin Chandak
Thorsten Joachims
dcterms:description: A shopping dataset consisting of user ratings on self-selected items and uniformly sampled ones. These two parts of data are used for training and testing, respectively. The ratings are used as reward signals.
dcterms:title: Coat

dcterms:creator: Benjamin M Marlin
Richard S Zemel
dcterms:description: A music dataset with training set and testing set collection similar to Coat. The ratings on the user-selected items are used for training, while those on the randomly picked items are for testing. Similarly, the ratings are treated as reward signals.
dcterms:title: Yahoo
